content:
I cache the data in RAM, also in a database, and then also grab the data from archive node
depends if the current process has restarted since the last query... or if the data has ever been queried before. 
Also some data I store is a result of processing a lot of data from a node, and takes a while to re-generate, so I pre-populated the database

author: alexssd7fp
content: You do not need an archive node to fetch transactions - that type of node is required only if you want to access historical state

author: alexssd7fp
content: Regular fast/snap sync node will work just fine for fetching txs
